privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important. This policy explains how information is handled on this portfolio.
privacy.no_personal_data: We do not track or store any personally identifiable information (PII) whatsoever.
privacy.analytics_text: We use Mixpanel and Firebase to collect anonymous usage analytics to improve the user experience. These tools may collect non-personal information such as device type, browser information, and pages visited.
privacy.contact_text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, feel free to contact me.
